scripts.build:lib: cpx "node_modules/jquery/dist/jquery.min.js" wwwroot/lib/jquery/dist && cpx "node_modules/@colmkenna/ck-tabs/dist/**" wwwroot/lib/@colmkenna/ck-tabs/dist && cpx "node_modules/jquery-validation/dist/jquery.validate.min.js" wwwroot/lib/jquery-validation && cpx "node_modules/jquery-validation/dist/jquery.validate.js" wwwroot/lib/jquery-validation && cpx "node_modules/jquery-validation/dist/additional-methods.min.js" wwwroot/lib/jquery-validation && cpx "node_modules/jquery-validation/dist/additional-methods.js" wwwroot/lib/jquery-validation && cpx "node_modules/jquery-validation-unobtrusive/dist/jquery.validate.unobtrusive.min.js" wwwroot/lib/jquery-validation-unobtrusive && cpx "node_modules/jquery-validation-unobtrusive/dist/jquery.validate.unobtrusive.js" wwwroot/lib/jquery-validation-unobtrusive
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:lib
